info.name: Diner
info.description: It takes guts to open a restaurant in Times Square that lacks a theme or strives to be classier than a carnival. Granted, Diner offers an audacious voyeur's paradise in its soaring staircase that rises alongside a suspended abstract sculpture of a fork. Mayson Bacon Jr. has succeeded finding a perfect balance between class and bacon. And to repeat what I'm saying: It takes guts to open a restaurant in Times Square that lacks a theme or strives to be classier than a carnival.

category.name: Soups
category.dish: Carrot soup with blue cheese, served with freshly baked bread.
Warmly spiced, creamy pumpkin soup.
Chines soup of eggs and veggies in clear broth.
Tomato soup flavoured with chili.

category.name: Vegetarian
category.dish: A mixed green salad with Caesar dressing, Parmesan cheese, croutons and arugula with a choice of chicken breast, marinated shrimps, bacon or chevre.

A mixed green salad with cherry tomato, cucumber, fresh pineapple, orange, marinated red onion, watermelon, arugula & deep-fried spring rolls. Served with ranch dressing, toasted bread and Sweet Chili sauce.
A mixed green salad with salmon fillet, cherry tomato, cucumber, fresh pineapple, orange, marinated red onion, watermelon, lime & arugula. Oil & herb dressing and toasted bread.

category.name: Seafood
category.dish: Whatever fish comes up, served with seasonal vegetables and Tartar sauce.
King Prawn skewers go perfectly with spicy broccoli, creamcheese sauce and rice cakes.
Delicious and juicy lobster tail rests on a perfect 200g entrecote steak.
A perfectly grilled fillet of salmon with a crispy crust, served with a zesty lemon rice.
Spicy grilled octopus fresh from the sea comes with vegetables from our own garden.
A huge steak of fresh tuna, baked sweet potato and lime mayo.

category.name: Steaks
category.dish: A 250g sirloin steak, fries, seasonal veggies and BBQ mayo.
A 180g sirloin steak, deep-fried king prawns, bell pepper, asparagus, red onion, whiskey- and Bearnaise sauce, Criss Cuts and garnished with arugula.
Lamb Loin Chops with minty mushed peas, country fries and creamy mustard sauce.
Chicken breast with Latino sauce and salad of cherry tomatos, cucumber, marinated red onion & arugula. Fresh pineapple, garlic mayonnaise and Criss Cuts.

category.name: Desserts
category.dish: Chocolate muffin with white-chock chips, served with vanilla whipped cream.
Apple pie with pecan nuts and raisins, served with vanilla ice cream and chocolate sauce.
A giant milk shake with a choice of banana-chocolate, chocolate, strawberry-vanilla or mint-chocolate. Made with real fruits and choc.
A home made cheesecake served with heaps of whipped cream and Goji-berry & strawberry sauces.
Chocolate muffin with white-chock chips, served with vanilla whipped cream.
Apple pie with pecan nuts and raisins, served with vanilla ice cream and chocolate sauce.
A giant milk shake with a choice of banana-chocolate, chocolate, strawberry-vanilla or mint-chocolate. Made with real fruits and choc.
A home made cheesecake served with heaps of whipped cream and Goji-berry & strawberry sauces.

category.name: Drinks
category.dish: 2dl of red Tabasco with a hint of Vodka. Added some tomato juice (just for decoration).
98% Denat. ethanol. Also known as Sinol.
A giant milk shake with a choice of banana-chocolate, chocolate, strawberry-vanilla or mint-chocolate liquers.
One giant vodka bottle with energy drink and caffeine pills. Decorated with coffee beans and small umberella.
